item.description: It's a beautiful day out but not much is scheduled for hiking.  I thought it would be nice to walk the Boston Waterfront, North End and Greenway.  We will stop at a bakery in the North End for a quick optional snack.  Plan on about two hours.  I will show you some of my favorite spots to view the harbor during the walk.  I will be wearing a Red Sox hat and will be just outside the entrance to the South Station train depot not subway.  The main entrance has a clock, eagle and pillars above it and can be seen at this url www.south-station.net.  Everyone is responsible for themselves so if you want to opt out early there will be points that you can leave early from the walk.  Hope to see you there.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be just outside the entrance to South Station Train Depot wearing a Red Sox hat
item.name: Late risers afternoon walk around Boston Waterfront, North End, Greenway
